title: Securely Distribute Press Screener
description: A film studio needs to send a secure, watermarked screener of a new movie to a list of approved journalists before its release.

tasks.description: Retrieve the final version of the movie and the list of approved journalists.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the movie file and the distribution list.

tasks.description: Generate a unique, forensically watermarked copy of the movie for each journalist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates individually watermarked files for each recipient.

tasks.description: Send a secure, time-limited viewing link for the watermarked copy to each journalist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully distributes the secure links.
